security_settings.Fixed by env var: This is fixed by the env var {{key}}={{value}}.
security_settings.The whitelist of registration permission: The whitelist of registration permission E-mail address
security_settings.users_without_account: Users without account is not accessible
security_settings.restrict_emails: You can restrict email registration to your wiki by writing an email domain (beginning with @).
security_settings.for_example: For example, if you would like to restrict registration to users within the growi.org domain, you can write
security_settings.in_this_case: ; in this case, only users within the growi.org domain would be able to register, and all other users would be rejected.
security_settings.insert_single: Please insert single e-mail address per line.
security_settings.page_listing_1_desc: Show pages that are restricted by 'Only me' option when listing/searching
security_settings.page_listing_2_desc: Show pages that are restricted by User group when listing/searching
security_settings.deletion_explanation: Restricts users who can trash the selected single page.
security_settings.complete_deletion_explanation: Restricts users who can completely delete  selected single page.
security_settings.recursive_deletion_explanation: Restricts users who can trash pages including descendants.
security_settings.recursive_complete_deletion_explanation: Restricts users who can completely delete pages including descendants.
security_settings.is_all_group_membership_required_for_pag: Users other than admin and page author are required to belong to all groups that are granted page access
Effective when page access settings is set to "Only specific groups".
security_settings.inherit: Inherit(Use the same setting as for a single page)

user_homepage_deletion.enable_force_delete_user_homepage_on_use: When you delete a user, the user's homepage and all its sub pages will be completely deleted
user_homepage_deletion.desc: You will be able to delete a deleted user's homepage.

security_settings.max_age_desc:
Specifies the number (in milliseconds) to expire users session.
Default: 2592000000 (30days)
security_settings.max_age_caution: Restarting the server is required after you modify this value.
security_settings.forced_update_desc: Settings have been forcibly changed. Previous setting:
security_settings.page_delete_rights_caution:
The "Delete / Delete All" permission (including descendant pages) is forced to be stronger than the "Delete / Completely Delete" permission.

Admin only > Admin and autor > Anyone
security_settings.desc_of_callback_URL: Use it in the setting of the {{AuthName}} Identity provider

read_only_users_comment.deny: Deny (Prohibit reead only users from comment management)
read_only_users_comment.accept: Allow (Read only users can manage comments)

security_settings.Treat username matching as identical: Automatically bind external accounts newly logged in to local accounts when username match
security_settings.Treat username matching as identical_war: WARNING: Be aware of security because the system treats the same user as a match of username.
security_settings.Treat email matching as identical: Automatically bind external accounts newly logged in to local accounts when email match
security_settings.Treat email matching as identical_warn: WARNING: Be aware of security because the system treats the same user as a match of email.
security_settings.Use default if both are empty: If both ​​are empty, the default value {{target}} is used.
security_settings.missing mandatory configs: The following mandatory items are not set in either database nor environment variables.

Local.name: ID/Password
Local.note for the only env option:
The LOCAL authentication is limited by the value of environment variable.
To change this setting, please change to false or delete the value of the environment variable {{env}} .
Local.password_reset_desc: when forgot password, users are able to reset it by themselves.
Local.enable_email_authentication_desc: Email authentication is going to be performed for user registration.

ldap.server_url_detail: The LDAP URL of the directory service in the format ldap://host:port/DN or ldaps://host:port/DN.
ldap.bind_DN_manager_detail: The DN of the account that authenticates and queries the directory service
ldap.bind_DN_user_detail1: The query used to bind with the directory service.
ldap.bind_DN_user_detail2: Use {{username}} to reference the username entered in the login page.
ldap.bind_DN_password_manager_detail: The password for the Bind DN account.
ldap.bind_DN_password_user_detail: The password that is entered in the login page will be used to bind.
ldap.search_filter_detail1: The query used to locate the authenticated user.
ldap.search_filter_detail2: Use {{username}} to reference the username entered in the login page.
ldap.search_filter_detail3: If empty, the filter (uid={{username}}) is used.
ldap.username_detail: Specification of mappings for username when creating new users
ldap.name_detail: Specification of mappings for full name when creating new users
ldap.mail_detail: Specification of mappings for mail address when creating new users
ldap.group_search_base_DN_detail: The base DN from which to search for groups. If defined, also Group Search Filter must be defined for the search to work.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail1: The query used to filter for groups.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail2: Login via LDAP is accepted only when this query hits one or more groups.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail3: Use {{dn}} to have it replaced of the found user object.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail4: (&(cn=group1)(memberUid={{dn}})) hits the groups which has cn=group1 and memberUid includes the user's uid(when Group DN Property is not changed from the default value.)
ldap.group_search_user_DN_property_detail: The property of user object to use in {{dn}} interpolation of Group Search Filter.

SAML.name: SAML
SAML.id_detail: Specification of the name of attribute which can identify the user in SAML Identity Provider
SAML.username_detail: Specification of mappings for username when creating new users
SAML.mapping_detail: Specification of mappings for {{target}} when creating new users
SAML.cert_detail: PEM-encoded X.509 signing certificate to validate the response from IdP
SAML.Use env var if empty: If the value in the database is empty, the value of the environment variable {{env}} is used.
SAML.note for the only env option:
The setting item that enables or disables the SAML authentication and the highlighted setting items use only the value of environment variables.
To change this setting, please change to false or delete the value of the environment variable {{env}} .
SAML.attr_based_login_control_detail: Limit who can sign up by using <saml: Attribute> element included in <saml: AttributeStatement> element and its child element <saml: AttributeValue>.
SAML.attr_based_login_control_rule_help:
Supported Queries:
  • Terms
  • Fields
  • AND/NOT/OR Operator
  • Grouping
Unsupported Queries:
  • Wildcard, Fuzzy, Proximity, Range and Boosting
  • +/- Operator
  • Field Grouping
Escaping special characters
It is needed to escape following special characters:
+ - && || ! ( ) { } [ ] ^ " ˜ * ? : \ and /
SAML.attr_based_login_control_rule_example1:
Example for conditions
If a rule is (Department: A || Department: B) && Position: Leader, users who have either Department: A or Department: B and have Position: Leader can sign in.
SAML.attr_based_login_control_rule_example2:
Example for escaping
If you would like to use URL as a query value, escape the following:
http\:\/\/schemas.example.com\/ws\/2005\/05\/identity\/claims\/emailaddress: "myname@example.com"

OAuth.change_redirect_url:
Enter %s
(where %s is your host name) for "Authorized redirect URIs".

Google.name: Google OAuth
Google.register_2: Create Project if no projects exist
Google.register_3: Create Credentials → OAuth client ID → Select "Web application"
Google.register_4: Register your OAuth App with one of Authorized redirect URIs as {{url}}
Google.register_5: Copy and paste your ClientID and Client Secret above
Google.updated_google: Succeeded to update Google OAuth setting

GitHub.name: GitHub OAuth
GitHub.register_2: Register your OAuth App with "Authorization callback URL" as {{url}}
GitHub.register_3: Copy and paste your ClientID and Client Secret above

This is the way that compatible with Crowi,
but not recommended in GROWI because it is too complex.

notification_settings.pattern_desc: Path name of wiki. Pattern expression with * can be used.
notification_settings.link_notification_help: The page that is able to be viewed only by those who know the link 'Anyone with the link' is not notified always.
notification_settings.just_me_notification_help: The page that is restricted by 'Only Me' is notify when the page edited.
notification_settings.group_notification_help: The page that is restricted by 'User Group' is notify when the page edited.

email.ifttt_link: Create a new IFTTT applet with Email trigger

notification_settings.updated_slackApp: Succeeded to update Slack App Configuration setting
notification_settings.delete_notification_pattern_desc2: Once deleted, it cannot be recovered

full_text_search_management.rebuild_description_1: Click the button to rebuild index and add all page datas.

mailer_setup_required: Email settings are required to send.

admin_top.wiki_administrator: Only wiki administrator can access this page
admin_top.assign_administrator: You can assign the selected user to be a wiki administrator on the User Management page using the 'Grant admin access' button
admin_top.env_var_priority: For environment variables other than security, the value of the database is obtained preferentially.
admin_top.about_security: Check Security Settings for security environment variables.
admin_top.submit_bug_report: then submit your issue to GitHub.

v5_page_migration.migration_desc: There are some pages with old v4 compatibility. To take advantage of new features such as page trees and easy renaming, please convert all your pages to v5 compatibility.
v5_page_migration.migration_note: Note: You will lose unique constraints from the page paths.
v5_page_migration.modal_migration_warning: This process may take long. It is highly recommended that administrators tell users not to create, modify, or delete pages during the conversion.
v5_page_migration.already_upgraded: You have already completed the conversion to v5 compatibility
v5_page_migration.migration_succeeded: Your upgrade has been successfully completed! Exit maintenance mode and GROWI can be used.
v5_page_migration.migration_failed: Upgrade failed. Please refer to the GROWI docs for information on what to do in the event of failure.

maintenance_mode.warning_message_to_start: You will NOT able to access other than admin settings page. General users will NOT able to access to any contents until maintenance mode ends manually.
maintenance_mode.warning_message_to_end: Please make sure that "data importing" or "upgrading to v5" is already done or not. If not, it is highly recommended to keep maintenance mode on.
maintenance_mode.supplymentary_message_to_start: As for the API, only the administrator API will be functional.
maintenance_mode.description: Maintenance mode restricts all user operations. Always start the maintenance mode before "importing data" and "upgrading to V5". To exit, go to "Security Settings" > "Maintenance Mode".

app_setting.sitename_change: You can change site name which is used for header and HTML title.
app_setting.header_content: The contents entered here will be shown in the header etc.

site_url.title: Site URL settings
site_url.desc: This is for the site URL setting.
site_url.warn: Some features don't work because the site URL is not set.
site_url.help: Site full URL beginning from http:// or https://.
site_url.note_for_the_only_env_option:
The Site URL is fixed to the value of the environment variable.
To change this setting, please change to false or delete the value of the environment variable {{env}} .

app_setting.enable_files_except_image: Enabling this option will allow upload of any file type. Without this option, only image file upload is supported.
app_setting.attach_enable: You can attach files other than image files if you enable this option.
app_setting.page_bulk_export_explanation: Enables a feature that allows all users to export a page and all it's child pages at once from the menu. Exported data will be automatically deleted after the storage period has passed.
app_setting.page_bulk_export_warning: The bulk page export feature is available to all users. In order to maintain system resources, we ask for your cooperation in using the minimum amount necessary. If you are an administrator, please inform all users of this.
app_setting.mailer_is_not_set_up: E-mail setting is not set up.
app_setting.confirm_to_initialize_mail_settings: You can't restore to the current settings. Are you sure you want to initialize e-mail settings?
app_setting.file_delivery_method_redirect_info: Redirect: It redirects to a signed URL without GROWI server, it gives excellent performance.
app_setting.file_delivery_method_relay_info: Internal System Relay: The GROWI server delivers to clients, it provides complete security.
app_setting.fixed_by_env_var: This is fixed by the env var {{envKey}}={{envVar}}.
app_setting.azure_note_for_the_only_env_option:
The Azure Settings is limited by the value of environment variable.
To change this setting, please change to false or delete the value of the environment variable {{env}} .
app_setting.file_upload: This is for uploading file settings. If you complete file upload settings, file upload function, profile picture function etc will be enabled.
app_setting.change_setting: Caution:if you change this setting not completed, you will not be able to access files you have uploaded so far.
app_setting.custom_endpoint_change: Input the URL of the endpoint of an object storage service like MinIO that has a S3-compatible API.  Amazon S3 is used if empty.
app_setting.use_env_var_if_empty: If the value in the database is empty, the value of the environment variable {{variable}} is used.
app_setting.note_for_the_only_env_option:
The GCS Settings is limited by the value of environment variable.
To change this setting, please change to false or delete the value of the environment variable {{env}} .

markdown_settings.lineBreak_desc: You can change line break settings.

lineBreak_options.enable_lineBreak_desc: Convert line break in the text page to<br>in HTML
lineBreak_options.enable_lineBreak_for_comment_desc: Convert line break in comment to<br>in HTML

indent_options.indentSize_desc: Set the default indent size for the Markdown editor
indent_options.disallow_indent_change: Disallow change of indent size by users
indent_options.disallow_indent_change_desc: Force users to use ther default indent size.

markdown_settings.xss_desc: You can change the handling of HTML tags in markdown text.

xss_options.remove_all_tags_desc: Stripe all HTML tags and attributes

default_sidebar_mode.title: Default sidebar mode
default_sidebar_mode.desc: You can set the sidebar mode for new users and guests visiting the page.
default_sidebar_mode.dock_mode_default_desc: You can set the initial state of the sidebar when Dock Mode is selected.
default_sidebar_mode.dock_mode_default_open: Open the page as it was opened from the beginning
default_sidebar_mode.dock_mode_default_close: Open the page as it was closed from the beginning

customize_settings.function_desc: You can choose Valid/Invalid of the function

function_options.timeline_desc1: You can show the timeline of the child pages.
function_options.timeline_desc2: If there are many child pages, performance decreases while page loading.
function_options.timeline_desc3: You can speed up list page display by invalidating.
function_options.tab_switch_desc1: Save edit tab and history tab switching in the browser and make it object for forward/back command of the browser.
function_options.tab_switch_desc2: By invalidating, you can make page transition as the only object for forward/back command of the browser.
function_options.attach_title_header: Add h1 section when create new page automatically
function_options.attach_title_header_desc: Add page path to the first line as h1 section when create new page.
function_options.list_num_s: Number of list displayed on modals
function_options.list_num_desc_s: Set number of list per page such as 'Page List', 'Timeline', 'Page History' and 'Attachment' pages.
function_options.list_num_m: Number of list displayed on article pages included other contents
function_options.list_num_desc_m: Set number of list per page such as 'Bookmarks' and 'Recently created' pages.
function_options.list_num_l: Number of list displayed on 'Search' pages
function_options.list_num_desc_l: Set number of list per page such as 'Search' pages.
function_options.list_num_xl: Number of list displayed on article pages
function_options.list_num_desc_xl: Set number of list per page such as 'Not found' and 'Trash' pages.
function_options.stale_notification_desc: Displays the notification to pages more than 1 year since the last update.
function_options.show_all_reply_comments_desc: When the setting value is off, comments other than the latest two are omitted.
function_options.select_search_scope_children_as_default: Select 'Only children of this tree' as default value of search range
function_options.select_search_scope_children_as_default_: When the setting value is off, 'All pages' is used as default value of search range.
function_options.show_page_side_authors: Always display creators and updaters above the table of contents
function_options.show_page_side_authors_desc: Displays information about the creator and the last updater above the table of contents in the page sidebar.

presentation_options.enable_marp_desc: Marp can be used in presentation preview. This option may make you vulnerable to XSS.
presentation_options.marp_in_growi: GROWI Docs - Create slide using Marp

customize_settings.custom_title_detail: You can customize <title> tag. Following placeholders will be automatically replaced:
customize_settings.custom_title_detail_placeholder1: {{sitename}} - The site name of this wiki.
customize_settings.custom_title_detail_placeholder2: {{pagename}} - The page name of the current page.
customize_settings.custom_title_detail_placeholder3: {{pagepath}} - The page path of the current page.
customize_settings.custom_noscript_detail:
You can customize Noscript code that applies all pages. Your custom Noscript will be inserted into the <noscript> tag that is located as the first element of body.
Relaod page to see changes.
customize_settings.write_css: You can write CSS that is applied to whole system.
customize_settings.write_java: You can write Javascript that is applied to whole system.
customize_settings.reflect_change: You need to reload the page to reflect the change.

error.only_upsert_available: Only 'Upsert' option is available for pages collection.

description_of_import_mode.about: When you import data with the same name as an existing one, choose from the following three modes below.
description_of_import_mode.upsert: Upsert: Overwrite and update the existing data with imported data.
description_of_import_mode.flash_and_insert: Flash and Insert: After deleting the existing data completely, import the data

initialize_meta_datas.label: Initialize page's like, read users and comment count

overwrite_author.label: Overwrite revision's author with the current user

export_management.desc_password_seed:
DO NOT FORGET to set current PASSWORD_SEED to your new GROWI system when restoring user data, or users will NOT be able to login with their password.

HINT:
The current PASSWORD_SEED will be stored in meta.json in exported ZIP.

update_parent_confirm_modal.force_update_parents_description: Enable this option to force the addition of missing users to the ancestor groups if they exist after changing a parent group.

g2g.error_generate_growi_archive: Failed to generate GROWI archive file
g2g.error_send_growi_archive: Failed to send GROWI archive file to the destination GROWI

external_user_group.description_form_detail: Please note that edited value will be overwritten on next sync if description mapper is set in sync settings
external_user_group.only_description_edit_allowed: Only description can be edited for external user groups
external_user_group.sync_being_executed: There is a running external group sync process started by you or another user. The next sync cannot be executed until this finishes.
external_user_group.execution_time_warning: If the number of groups or users is large, it might take a while until sync finishes
external_user_group.parallel_sync_forbidden: While sync is executing, you cannot execute a different external group sync

ldap.group_search_base_dn_detail: The base DN for searching groups. The value set in security settings will be used if not set here.
ldap.membership_attribute_detail: Attribute of the group object which indicates user membership info
ldap.membership_attribute_type_detail: Whether membership attribute value is of type DN or UID
ldap.child_group_attribute_detail: Attribute of the group object which indicates child group info. The attribute value needs to be the DN of the child group.
ldap.name_mapper_detail: Attribute to map as group name
ldap.password_detail: Login password is necessary because Bind type is set to User Bind
ldap.auth_not_set: Enable and configure LDAP auth in security settings before sync

keycloak.group_realm_detail: Realm that contains the groups to sync
keycloak.group_sync_client_realm: Realm of client used to request to Admin API
keycloak.group_sync_client_realm_detail: Realm that contains the client used to authenticate to request to Keycloak admin API
keycloak.group_sync_client_id_detail: Id of the client used to authenticate to request to Keycloak admin API
keycloak.group_sync_client_secret_detail: Id of the secret used to authenticate to request to Keycloak admin API
keycloak.auth_not_set: Enable OIDC or SAML host that includes 'Host' and 'Group Realm' of group sync settings

external_user_group.description_mapper_detail: Attribute to map as group description. Description can be edited after sync. However, when a mapper is set, the edited value can possibly be overwritten by the next sync.

toaster.switch_disable_link_sharing_success: Succeeded to update share link setting

forbidden_page.do_not_have_admin_permission: Users without administrative rights cannot access the administration screen

ai_integration.disable_mode_explanation:
Currently, AI integration is disabled. To enable it, configure the AI_ENABLED environment variable along with the required additional variables.

For details, please refer to the documentation.
